page.title: 10CHIPPENHAM CATTLE MARKET
page.content: {Chippenham Cattle Market}is the largest one day market in Engalnd. Farmers come from near and far,some come from as far as{Scotland,}and {Cornwall. Each week somewhere between Â£750,000 and Â£1,000,000 changes hands. The Cattle Market has 7 auction rings. The busiest time of the year is from {September to May.} The market is held on a Friday and on a typical Friday about 2,000 head of cattle would be sold. There are five full-time staff and nine autioneers,and up to 80 people are employed part-time. As well as cattle the market deals in sheep,pigs,and poultry.Some dairy produce and eggs are also sold. The market covers about{12 acres. The future of the market is good,it will probably grow each year.
